name: srnArtGallery
description: srnArtGallery is a union of NFT artists. It is a community that wants to spread art globally and reach out to more art lovers. At the center of the srnArtGallery is the $SACT token. It gives people chance to have NFT Arts with paying nothing. $SACT solves the problem of Expensive NFT Art by staking and farming. You can Stake SACT on Unifty.io to farm NFTs from srnArtGallery. There are 4 Farms available now and we will hardly work to add new ones in the future.
